name: Resend Transactional Email
description: Transactional email sending with Resend and React Email. Includes email templates, sending utilities, and API routes.

usage.configuration:
1. Get API key from resend.com
2. Add RESEND_API_KEY and EMAIL_FROM to .env
3. Verify your domain in Resend dashboard
usage.example:
import { sendEmail } from '@/lib/email'
await sendEmail({ to: 'user@example.com', subject: 'Welcome!', react: WelcomeEmail({ name: 'User' }) })

author: vibe-templates
